query: SELECT id, title, LENGTH(body) as body_length, isScraped, sourceUrl, LEFT(body, 200) as body_preview FROM articles WHERE id = '464f24119488c0ce450' LIMIT 1;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2U1m8QtvRs7KSsb.root --database gEvA5pFfHJY7UujAHBKvxH --execute SELECT id, title, LENGTH(body) as body_length, isScraped, sourceUrl, LEFT(body, 200) as body_preview FROM articles WHERE id = '464f24119488c0ce450' LIMIT 1;
